DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to demonstrate the ability of the Sofia Strep A FIA test and Sofia Analyzer to accurately detect a throat swab specimen for the presence or absence of Group A Streptococcus when compared to culture.
DOC.brief_title: Sofia Strep A FIA Field Study
